recipe_name: Spring greens salad with chargrilled baby corn, cherry tomatoes and balsamic and parsley dressing
author: Garrey Dawson
method: For the dressing, whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and chopped parsley in a small bowl. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. For the salad, place all of the salad ingredients into a large bowl, drizzle over the dressing and toss  well to coat. For the chargrilled baby corn, heat a griddle until hot. Toss the baby corn in a bowl with the olive oil, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and then cook on the griddle for 2-3 minutes on both sides, until tender. To serve, place the chargrilled baby corn onto a serving plate and top with the salad.
